headline: Simon Property Group Elevates Eli Simon to Chief Operating Officer
summary: The promotion places Eli Simon in line to potentially succeed David Simon, his father, as the next chief executive officer of the nation's largest shopping center owner and operator.

raw.headline: Simon Property Group Elevates Eli Simon to Chief Operating Officer

headline: Realty Income Q2 AFFO Falls Short of Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: O's second-quarter 2025 results reflect a year-over-year rise in revenues. However, higher interest expenses remain a concern.

headline: Simon速 Announces Key Executive Appointments
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced that Eli Simon, Executive Vice President, Chief Investment Officer and Director has been promoted to Chief Operating Officer.
